shortDescription: WebSVN before 2.6.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the search parameter.
vulnerabilityName: websvn websvn Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
